vclaim: The U.S. Consumer Products Safety Commission announced that Peloton recalled approximately 125,000 of its Tread+ treadmill machines with model number TR01 on May 5, 2021.
title: RECALL: Peloton Tread+ Treadmills
subtitle: The company received dozens of reports of adult users, children, pets, and/or objects being pulled under the rear of the treadmills.
author: Bethania Palma
